meanings.definition: The final resolution or outcome of a story or play.
meanings.sent1: The denouement of the movie revealed the true identity of the villain.
meanings.sent2: The denouement of the play left the audience feeling satisfied.
meanings.sent3: At the denouement of the mystery novel, the detective turned out to be the culprit!
meanings.sent4: The denouement of the court case was unexpected, like a plot twist in a movie.
meanings.sent5: The denouement of the story tied up all loose ends beautifully.

meanings.definition: The unraveling or resolution of a complex situation.
meanings.sent1: The denouement of the negotiation finally brought peace between the two parties.
meanings.sent2: After hours of discussion, the denouement of the conflict was reached.
meanings.sent3: The denouement of the argument was surprisingly simple: they agreed to disagree.
meanings.sent4: The denouement of the problem was like finding the last piece of a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The denouement of the situation clarified everything that was once confusing.
